name: Alien Evolution World
description:
Raise up an origin of life, embark on top of the food chain
Surviving in a journey with thousands of species evolution

  • Raise and evolve your alien, experience the amazing diverged biological changes
  • Earn more food resources with mini games
  • Discover new evolution route by estimating your proportion of food accordingly to evolution guide
  • A glimpse on the path of evolution of the alien...
